sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Agreement Among the States to Elect the President by National Popular Vote Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Agreement Among the States to Elect the President by National Popular Vote Act.

sections.heading: Ratification and approval of compact. The State of Illinois ratifies and approves the following compact:
sections.text: Ratification and approval of compact. The State of Illinois ratifies and approves the following compact:

sections.heading: of the People in Member States to Vote for President and Vice President
sections.text: of the People in Member States to Vote for President and Vice President

sections.heading: of Appointing Presidential Electors in Member States
sections.text: of Appointing Presidential Electors in Member States

sections.heading: Enforcement.  The agencies and officers of this State and its subdivisions shall enforce this compact and do all things appropriate to effect its purpose and intent that may be within their respective jurisdictions
sections.text: Enforcement. The agencies and officers of this State and its subdivisions shall enforce this compact and do all things appropriate to effect its purpose and intent that may be within their respective jurisdictions.
